comments: Mr. Bittle is the best teacher I have ever had. I learned a lot in his class. He allows his students to discuss ethical topics, and how some of these topics can affect a person\'s life. One major paper that he grades in sections. Easiest A. Mr. Bittle is a professor that it\'s not for the system, but for the student. I wish there were more like him.
